name: Bills
description: God of Destruction Beerus, also known as Beers, or Beerus in Latin America and initially in Spain[1], is a character that was introduced in the film Dragon Ball Z: Battle of the Gods, where he is the main antagonist of the film.

originPlanet.name: Beerus' Planet
originPlanet.description: Beerus' Planet, a celestial body located within the world of the living in Universe 7, which appears for the first time in the movie Dragon Ball Z: Battle of the Gods.
